trans-unit.source: Represents a single-row update operation expressed as a command tree.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma operação de atualização de linha única expressada como uma árvore de comandos.
Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbUpdateCommandTree.Returning%2A> property is set, the command returns a reader; otherwise, it returns a scalar value indicating the number of rows affected.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbUpdateCommandTree.Returning%2A>propriedade for definida, o comando devolve um leitor; caso contrário, devolve um valor escalar indicar o número de linhas afetadas.</xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbUpdateCommandTree.Returning%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that specifies the predicate used to determine which members of the target collection should be updated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"> </xref> que especifica o predicado utilizado para determinar quais os membros da coleção de destino devem ser atualizados.

trans-unit.source: The predicate can include only the following elements: a <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbComparisonExpression> representing equality; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbConstantExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbIsNullExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression>; a <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbVariableReferenceExpression> that references the target; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAndExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbOrExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNotExpression>.
trans-unit.target: O predicado pode incluir apenas os seguintes elementos: uma igualdade representing <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbComparisonExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbConstantExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbIsNullExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression>; um <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbVariableReferenceExpression>que referencia o destino; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAndExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbOrExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNotExpression>.</xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNotExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbOrExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAndExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbVariableReferenceExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbIsNullExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbConstantExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbComparisonExpression>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that specifies the predicate used to determine which members of the target collection should be updated.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"> </xref> que especifica o predicado utilizado para determinar quais os membros da coleção de destino devem ser atualizados.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that specifies a projection of results to be returned, based on the modified rows.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"> </xref> que especifica uma projeção de resultados a ser devolvido, com base nas linhas modificadas.

trans-unit.source: The returning projection includes only the following elements: <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNewInstanceExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression>.
trans-unit.target: A projecção devolvida inclui apenas os seguintes elementos: <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNewInstanceExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression>.</xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNewInstanceExpression>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that specifies a projection of results to be returned based, on the modified rows.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"> </xref> que especifica uma projeção de resultados, devem ser devolvidos com base nas linhas modificadas.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> indicates that no results should be returned from this command.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>indica que não obtiveram resultados devem ser devolvidos a partir deste comando.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of update set clauses that define the update operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista de atualização de cláusulas conjunto que definem a operação de atualização.

trans-unit.source: The list of update set clauses that define the update operation.
trans-unit.target: A lista de atualização definir cláusulas que definem a operação de atualização.
